title: My Love
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural conditions
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: Growing to love a man and his land.
description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop "Against the Grain" in association with Partners in Grain (PING). Almost 60 years old, Maureen Barry reminisces about her life, especially the last 35 years, of living on the land with the man she loves. From her youthful dreams as a young rural bride to the often harsh realiities of farm life in the sometimes unforgiving landscape of the Mallee. This story is dedicated to her husband, Brian.
